data.title: Back Ussa by Eugene Byrne, First Edition
data.meta_description: Back in the USSA (US HB 1st - SIGNED x2) by Newman, Kim - Byrne, Eugene and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. 1st Edition. US hardback first impression, SIGNED by both authors at title page with name only. Near fine with slightly creased cloth at spine ends, in near fine jacket. Signed by Author.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. Arnie Fenner, dj art. (illustrator). 1st Edition. The dust jacket is unclipped ($29.95). First Edition Stated. Signed by Kim Newman on the title page. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. First Edition. Edition limited to 300 signed and numbered copies, this being #167. Signed by Eugene Byrne and Kim Newman on the limitation page. 356pp. Red cloth stamped in gold on the spine panel. Spine heel a bit bruised else a fine copy in fine dustjacket. Original slipcase is in fine condition. ; Octavo; Signed by All Authors.
